definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: a king of Aram ([[חוֹבָה]]) defeated by David 2Sa 10:16, 2Sa 10:16, 2Sa 10:19 = 1Ch 19:16, 1Ch 19:19; also 1Ch 18:3, 1Ch 18:5, 1Ch 18:8, 1Ch 18:9, 1Ch 18:10 & [[הֲדַרְעָָזֶר]] v:1Ch 18:7, v:1Ch 18:10; all erron. for [[הֲדַדְעֶזֶד]] (q.v.), although LXX throughout (Adraazar.
